original_title: Balthazar - The Man from Another World
overview: Director Vishad Maharaj has his first experience in writing and directing. Here, Balthazar approaches two, clearly not grounded young men and monologues about his - otherworldly origins. A wild story unfolds here in something that can only be described as the Twilight Zone meets Abbott and Costello.
title: Balthazar - The Man from Another World
